wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Sir (William) John Eldridge KBE CB DSO MC (2 March 1898 – 3 November 1985) was a senior British Army officer who became General Officer Commanding Aldershot District.

response: * John Eldridge Jr. (1903–1942), United States Navy officer
* Lieutenant-General William John Eldridge, CB, CBE, DSO, MC (13420), late Royal Regiment of Artillery. Colonel Commandant, Royal Regiment of Artillery and Glider Pilot Regiment.
*Colonel (temporary Major-General) William John Eldridge, C.B.E., D.S.O., M.C., late Royal Artillery.
